index.description: An innovative platform that will professionalize your LIVHE!

presetConfig.freePlanOverlayLimit: The free plan allows only 1 overlay video. Upgrade to premium to add more overlay videos or remove the existing one.
presetConfig.freePlanActionLimit: The free plan allows only 5 Actions. Upgrade to premium to create more Actions or delete an existing action.
presetConfig.overlayUrlCopied: The overlay URL has been copied to the clipboard.

profile.title: Profile
profile.updateSuccessDescription: Your information has been successfully updated

overlayLink.title: Overlay Link
overlayLink.urlDescription: Use this link in OBS Studio or other streaming software as a browser source.

steps.2: 2. In OBS Studio, add a new source of type "Browser"
steps.3: 3. Paste the link in the URL field
steps.4: 4. Set the width and height according to your resolution
steps.5: 5. Check the option "Refresh browser when scene becomes active"

overlayLink.urlCopiedDescription: The overlay link has been copied to your clipboard.
